Name: Fairy Maids
About the game: In the Land of Fairy Tales, finding a happy ending is a trivial thing. That is until you look under the sofa or check the expiration dates in the fridge. Even the happiest of storybook creatures have their messy habits and dirty laundry. And who does the cleaning? Why, the cleaning fairy, of course! Welcome to The Glade's one and only cleaning service â€“ Fairy Maids! Take on the fast and fun Time Management gameplay! - Exciting action - Hilarious characters - Become the cleaning fairy!
